org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.camera

Class Mover

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.camera.Mover

  • public class Mover
extends java.lang.Object
    Moves the camera:

  • Forward
  • Backward
  • Left
  • Right

    • Pans the camera:

  • Left
  • Right

    • Each type of movement will have two methods: start and stop. When a movement is started, a boolean flag is set to true. The update method calls private calculating methods to calculate the movement.

    Movement and rotation speed are set as final floats. There is a possibility of passing them through in future versions of Mover in order to select control sensitivity.

Since:
2018-12-10, v0.2
Version:
v0.4
Author:
Alex Kalinins
